    • Method Detail

      • getCloseVivaes

        public java.util.Vector<VivaeObject> getCloseVivaes(java.util.Vector<VivaeObject> objects,
                                           java.util.Vector<Fixed> walls)
        This method removes all VivaeObjects that are further from owner of this Sensor than length of the Sensor is.
        Overrides:
        getCloseVivaes in class Sensor
        Parameters:
        objects - Vector of all VivaeObjects that are checked for distance from owner of this Sensor.
        walls - Vector of walls that can contain enclosing walls in Arena.
        Returns:
        new Vector of VivaeObjects that are close enough to be in range of Sensor.

      • getVivaesOnSight

        public java.util.Vector<VivaeObject> getVivaesOnSight(java.util.Vector<VivaeObject> objects)
        Method intersects area of Sensor and all VivaeObjects and returns those that have non-zero intersection.
        Overrides:
        getVivaesOnSight in class Sensor
        Parameters:
        objects - Vector of VivaeObjects that are checked for collision with the body of Sensor.
        Returns:
        Vector of VivaeObjects that are in collision with the body of Sensor.
